resources.string: If your home network IP-addressing was changed(you have changed your internet provider or you have been starting to use the new modem) you can manually set the new IP address of your controller
This action reset all buttons state indication, in your app, to the state off.\nThis action will not affect the controller itself
Set your local server IP address
You have not set an IP address
Tap for order to change the relay status
Set name of the current relay
You have not set an IP address for the local server
Update push notification token (from the local network only)
Attention you have to update your token.(Tap here)
